column4: hi all, I've installed ubuntu on my laptop and also have it on my desktop how easily can I mount my /home from the desktop on my laptop while they are both on the same network?
What I want to do is make it so that I can browse the /home from the laptop
What i would do, is simply SSH into ur desktop using openSSH
SSH ain´t really taking much resources, that´s how i would aproach it atleast.
